channel.title: Need a link to learn java
channel.description:
Could anyone give me a link to java, so that i can start coding my server for myself? Also, how do i work with people who do codes with me on my server? like how they do codes when i'm playing? and one more thing! How do i get people to play on m server? i have no-ip and hamachi :D One more thing! how do i get those things in my post under what i have now?like this:
What i posted --------------------
below comes some stuff
